    • buyDevelopmentCard

      public void buyDevelopmentCard​(int x, int y) throws InsufficientPaymentException, NonExistentCardException, java.lang.Exception
      this method lets the player buy a DevelopmentCard from the market
      Parameters:
      x - row index
      y - column index
      Throws:
      InsufficientPaymentException - if the player doesn't have enough resources to buy the card
      NonExistentCardException - if the card is not present
      java.lang.Exception

      this method takes the resources from the player's board
      Parameters:
      cost - the resources to take
      Throws:
      javax.naming.InsufficientResourcesException - if the player doesn't have enough resources
      java.lang.Exception

      this method check if the player has enough resources to pay the given cost
      Parameters:
      cost - the cost
      Throws:
      InsufficientPaymentException - if the player has not enough resources to buy the card or card is not present

      public void moveOnPopeRoadDiscard​(int steps)

      NonExistentCardException

      Throws:
